mapper.select: select * from admincalendar
mapper.delete: delete from admincalendar where title=#{title} and "START"='${start}'
mapper.select: select themanum, thema.themaname, count(themanum) "COUNT" from info_upload join thema using(themanum) where infoupstatus=1 group by themanum, thema.themaname order by 3 desc
select count(*) "info" from info_upload where infoupstatus=1 order by infoupdate desc
select (count(*)/2) "cp" from members where status=1 and cpid is not null
select count(*) "supt" from supporters
select count(*) "supStatus" from members where SUPSTATUS = '1'

select * from( select rownum as rnum, a.* from( select infouptitle ,infoupnum, infoupdate, avg(inforeviewpoint) "ravg" from info_review join info_upload using(infoupnum) where infoupstatus = 1 group by infoupnum, infouptitle, infoupdate )a order by 5 desc) where rnum between 1 and 5

select * from( select rownum as rnum, a.* from( select supnum, suplevel, sum(infouppayment) "rsum" from supporters join info_upload using(supnum) group by supnum, suplevel )a order by 4 desc) where rnum between 1 and 5

select * from( select rownum as rnum, a.* from( select * from supporters join members using(membernum) where MEMBERLEVEL = 2 and status = 1 order by supenrolldate desc )a order by 4 desc) where rnum between 1 and 5
select * from( select rownum as rnum, a.* from( select * from members where supstatus = 1 and status = 1 )a order by 4 desc) where rnum between 1 and 4

select to_date(infoupdate) "infoup", count(*) "dayInfo" from info_upload where (infoupdate between TO_DATE(sysdate-5) and TO_DATE(sysdate)) and infoupstatus = 1 GROUP by to_date(infoupdate) order by 1

select * from( select rownum as rnum, a.* from( select infouptitle, themaname, localcity, infouppayment, infoupphone, infouptime, infoupdate from info_upload inner join location using(localnum) inner join thema using(themanum) where infoupstatus = 1 order by infoupdate desc ) a)

select * from( select rownum as rnum, a.* from( select s.supnum, s.supuptitle, t.themaname, l.localcity, s.supupdate from supporters_upload s inner join info_upload i on(i.infoupnum = s.infoupnum) inner join location l on (i.localnum = l.localnum) inner join thema t on (i.themanum = t.themanum) where s.supupstatus = 1 order by s.supupdate desc ) a )
select * from( select rownum as rnum, a.* from( select * from supporters join members using(membernum) where status = 1 and memberlevel = 2 ) a)

select * from( select rownum as rnum, a.* from( select count(supnum) "UPLOAD", proimg, suplevel, sum(suppay) "SUM", id, phone, enrolldate from supporters join members using(membernum) join supporters_upload using(supnum) group by supnum, proimg, suplevel, suppay, id, phone, enrolldate order by 5 desc ) a)
select * from( select rownum as rnum, a.* from( select * from members where memberlevel != 0 order by enrolldate desc ) a)
select * from( select rownum as rnum, a.* from( select * from location ) a)
select * from( select rownum as rnum, a.* from( select * from thema where themanumref is not null ) a)
select * from members where supstatus = 1 and memberlevel = 1 order by enrolldate desc
select count(*) from thema where THEMANAME LIKE '%'||#{strTmp}||'%'

select membernum, id, name, phone, email, enrolldate, proimg, sublvcontent, suplvenrolldate ,fileorgname1, fileorgname2, fileorgname3, fileorgname4, fileorgname5 from members join supporters_lv_upload using(membernum) join supporters_lv_upload_img using(suplvnum) where membernum = #{memberNum} and supstatus = 1
mapper.update: update members set MEMBERLEVEL = 2 where MEMBERNUM = #{memberNum}
mapper.select: select * from( select rownum as rnum, a.* from( select * from adminnotice where noticestatus = 1 order by noticedate desc ) a) where rnum = 1
